instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Photos app . At the top left, tap Menu and then Trash . Touch and hold the photo or video you want to restore. At the bottom, tap Restore. The photo or video will be back: In your phone s gallery app In your Google Photos library In any albums it was in

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Photos app . At the top left, tap Menu and then Trash . Touch and hold the photo or video you want to restore. At the bottom, tap Restore. The photo or video will be back: In your phone s gallery app In your Google Photos library In any albums it was in
